sentences.en: And not only food: frequently there must be a beverage.
sentences.cn: 而且不仅仅为了食物，还常常必须有饮料。

sentences.en: Beer is a beverage of the remotest time.
sentences.cn: 啤酒是一种最古老的饮料.

sentences.en: But my beverage of choice is Dr. Pepper, of course.
sentences.cn: 但是我选择的饮料当然是,胡椒博士.

sentences.en: Buy: wine, tea, aquatic product, vegetables, health food, seasoning, food & beverage processing.
sentences.cn: 采购: 酒类, 茶类, 水产品, 蔬菜.健康食品, 调味品, 食品饮料加工.
咖啡是一种香味浓郁的饮料.

sentences.en: I'll contact the Food and Beverage Manager at once.
sentences.cn: 我会立即与餐饮部经理联系.

sentences.en: In this case, you want to provide the user with a way to say the desired beverage.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下，您想为用户提供一种方法，让他们说出自己想要的饮料。

sentences.en: One long swallow of the cold beverage cooled my sweating body.
sentences.cn: 我咕噜噜长长地吞下一口冰凉的可乐,冒汗的身体顿觉清爽无比.

sentences.en: Our Food and Beverage Manager will be contacting you.
sentences.cn: 我们的餐饮部经理会与您联系的.

sentences.en: Product utilized as both a stand alone beverage and mixer.
sentences.cn: 本品既可单独作为饮料出售,亦是绝佳的混合产品.

sentences.en: Provide complete food & beverage service for company meeting.
sentences.cn: 为您公司各类形式的会议,提供全方位 餐饮 服务.
熏鲑鱼 、 冰西瓜, 要什么饮料?

sentences.en: So do you have all of that unauthorized beverage out of your system?
sentences.cn: 你体内的非法饮料都清理出来了 吗 ?

sentences.en: That considerate lady made the beverage, and handed it to Mr. Bounderby.
sentences.cn: 那位体贴入微的贵妇人把那种饮料做好, 亲手端来给庞得贝先生.

sentences.en: The beverage is often colored with caramel.
sentences.cn: 这种饮料常用焦糖染色.

sentences.en: The longan repairs the brains, this type of beverage, be: Peerless beverage.
sentences.cn: 龙眼补脑汁, 这一种饮料, 就是: 盖世无双的饮料.

sentences.en: The tin - free steel has been used for the manufacture of beverage cans.
sentences.cn: 无锡钢一直用来制造饮料罐.
